channel.title: 'Aborted'' on both virtual machines
channel.description: Patrick I have this same problem whe I boot both virtual machines. After the red written ''failed!'' Pc stops, doesen't work. After a few minutes I can see ''Aborted'' on both virtual machines (workstation and Gatwey) You think is it a prolem of virtual machine or not? I cheked the pgp key ..

item.title: 'Aborted'' on both virtual machines
item.dc:creator: Luisjf
item.description:
yes I think so.
But Is it normal the red written word wile the sistem is booting '‘failded!’'
Is it normal or not ?

Read full topic

item.title: 'Aborted'' on both virtual machines
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t think it has anything to do with AppArmor. Because virtual machines are by design not supposed to be able to crash virtual machines in that way. (Aborted means crashed as far I know.)

Probably an error with the host operating system / virtualbox.

Read full topic
